embed.description: **Frost Guardian** is a Boss type enemy that the player can encounter.

fields.name: Phase 1 (Default)
fields.value:
**Stats**: <&Health&> 60 | <&Attack&> 0 | <&Counter&> 4 | <&ResistSnow&>
**Effects**: When <&Health&> lost, add equal <&Attack&> to self and allies

fields.name: Phase 2
fields.value:
**Stats**: <&Health&> 999 | <&Attack&> 2 | <&Counter&> 2 | <&ResistSnow&>
**Effects**: When an ally is killed, lose half <&Health&> and gain +2 <&Attack&>

fields.name: ||Notes||
fields.value: ||Phase one only shows if you haven't beaten the Frost Guardian before. After defeating it, your current leader will become the first Phase||

embed.title: Frost Guardian
